title: 2013 Isuzu Diesel Box Truck
item_description:
2013 Isuzu Diesel Box Truck

Specifications

  • Year: 2013
  • Make: Isuzu
  • VIN: JALE5W165D7900840
  • License: 62172M2
    • Registration Expiration: 11/30/2024
  • Odometer Reads: 171,331 (updated during preview 12/9/2024)
    • Previous: 171,153
  • Key: Available
  • Body Style: Box Truck
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 225/70R19.5
  • Deck Length: 216”
  • Deck Width: 88”
  • Wall Height: 85”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Cloth
  • Interior Color: Charcoal
  • Features:
    • Power Windows
  • Contents of truck NOT included. 

Note: Certificate of Duplicate Title, and Transfer Form, will be mailed within 1 week after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
